Description: TLDR: Buy tickets at www.quizitive.nl. Come and have a sip of our signature event, the Pubquiz at House of Watt. This quiz is based on general knowledge with interesting and diverse questions. There are multiple rounds in every quiz ranging from Music, Sports, Science, to Movies, Geography, Culture, and much more. The quizmasters Harsh and Lucas formulate the questions themselves through their unique journey and perspective about the world. "Ah! This must be super difficult?" Actually, no! We try to keep the difficulty moderate to accomodate folks with all backgrounds. Our main motive is that every guest should feel welcomed, enjoy their time, and learn something interesting at the end of the day. Our quizzes are ideal for locals and expats alike as the questions can be done in English, and Dutch too, if required. Alright, let's talk particulars. "How do I register?" You can buy our tickets at www.quizitive.nl. Ticket for one team costs 15 EUR. "Do I need a team?" Pub Quizzes are social event, and having more people in your team can be beneficial. Description: Experience the thrilling journey of retracing the footsteps of a secretive Dutch resistance member, The Falcon, and uncover a long-lost secret that could have changed the course of history. In this immersive game, you will explore the beautiful city of Arnhem and visit its most iconic landmarks.As you navigate through challenges and solve riddles, you will delve into the rich history of Arnhem and learn about the courageous sacrifices made during the Battle of Arnhem in World War II. The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and incredible stories. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. HOW IT WORKS‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. It is currently available in over 150 cities üåé and has entertained hundreds of thousands of players already. As of today, the app offers more than 400 different experiences created by a growing network of local content creators and event organizers.
Title: Arnhem Outdoor Escape Game: Echoes of Market Garden
Subtitle: Follow clues, solve puzzles, discover new places and learn incredible stories of the city's past and present during this city adventure.

Description: lululemon Amsterdam Hartenstraat x BTND. Run Crew Join lululemon at lululemon Amsterdam Hartenstraat for the official launch of BTND. Run Crew in Amsterdam - a run club all about connection, community, and fun. The event will kick off with a gentle warm-up run before everyone sets off on their run. An easy conversational pace, and short 3,5 km distance. An 30-minutes on your feet, looping around Amsterdam 9 streets and Frederik Hendrik neighbourhood. Crew Captain will also be on hand to make sure you feel supported from start to finish. After the session, stick around for more connection, post-run treats, and refreshments. Founded by Jake Williamson, Better The Next Day (BTND.) is a run crew all about chasing that post-run rush. What makes BTND different? Jake created the club to provide a safe space for anyone who wants to get moving‚Äîregardless of who they are, who they love, or how fast they run. Join the WhatsApp group to keep up to date on information: https://chat.whatsapp.com/JNqehYjU3RiHojAgpV6kSp WHEN: Wednesday 13 March, 2024, 18.15-19.30 WHERE: lululemon Hartenstraat Store, Hartenstraat 13, 1016BZ TIMINGS: 18.15: Arrival/ Bag drop off lululemon Hartenstraat 18:30: Begin running with a gentle warm up run 18:40: Running drills 18:55: Run back to Lululemon 19.00: Cool down stretches 19:10: Connection and refreshments 19.30: Finish Connect on Instagram: @lululemoneurope @better.the.next.day
Title: lululemon Amsterdam Hartenstraat x BTND Run Crew
Subtitle: lululemon Amsterdam Hartenstraat x BTND. Run Crew launch event in Amsterdam

Description: Fusion Toastmasters is the kind of club which embraces every member with warmth and kindness. Our mission is to create a safe and mutually supportive environment in which every member has the opportunity to practice public speaking as well as give and receive encouraging feedback. At Fusion Toastmasters, a good speaker can become a great speaker. And a great speaker can become exceptional.  Feel free to visit us as a guest and to experience the ‚Äúfusion‚Äù of cultures, mindsets, knowledge and fun. The number of guests is limited to 8 people. If the event is sold out, we recommend you to subscribe to the waiting list.  In the case that there's a cancellation and a ticket frees up, you will receive a notification and a guest ticket to attend!  Based on the above, if for any reason you cannot make it, we kindly ask you to cancel your guest ticket so that someone who is currently on the waiting list can attend the meeting. Kind regards, Gabriele on behalf of the Fusion Toastmasters board
Title: Fusion Toastmasters meeting (in person!)
Subtitle: Looking for a place to practice and improve your public speaking? Visit Fusion Toastmasters to experience a club full of fun and community:)

At this 30 min weekly class, you will join our global community to learn and practice the Soul Dimension Breathing technique guided by 35 years experienced facilitator, Sylvie Horvart. Soul Dimension Breathing is a simple and highly effective way to influence your total well-being. Description: Join the N 1 AI Thought Leadership Event of 2024 Hear the vision of the future from the most disruptive Silicon Valley AI startups, redefining the innovation landscape in every industry. Meet AI Innovators, Tribalizers and Visionaries. Step in the epicenter of AI Revolution. Visionary startup founders representing different industries gather on one stage to brief corporate executives about the state of AI in 2024 and debate about the future trends. Are you ready to witness the convergence of cutting-edge technology and genius minds? Brace yourselves for an extraordinary online event that aims to help you get ready to what is coming. Discover Disruptive AI Startups, showcasing their revolutionary technologies, explore groundbreaking advancements in AI, witness firsthand the innovations that are reshaping industries. Connect with like-minded industry leaders, corporate executives, investors and innovators. Forge strategic partnerships, exchange ideas, and be a part of the dynamic AI community. Elevate your understanding of the AI landscape with exclusive briefings from top-tier experts. Gain insights into the latest trends, market dynamics, and potential applications of AI that can propel your business to new heights. Immerse yourself in live demonstrations of cutting-edge AI solutions. Engage with the brilliant minds behind the innovations in real-time Q&A sessions. It's your chance to stay ahead of the AI disruption and maintain your leadership as the world heads to the era of AI. Our presenting AI companies will represent a variety of products - from consumer to enterprise level across different industries. You will see their live demos and get your questions answered, discover new use cases and practical applications of AI technologies for your business and your industry. Don't miss your chance to be in a front seat to witness the AI revolution! Get ready for a day of inspiration, collaboration, and groundbreaking discoveries. We look forward to seeing you at the Silicon Valley AI Startups Roadshow! BOOK THIS PROGRAM ONLINE ON-DEMAND FOR YOUR ORGANIZATION  (TAILORED FOR YOUR SPECIFIC NTERESTS AND NEEDS)  Or join the wait list for the Next Silicon Valley AI Startups Roadshow Live from Silicon Valley! Title: SILICON VALLEY AI STARTUP ROADSHOW & DEMO-DAY (ONLINE ON-DEMAND)
Subtitle: Meet Silicon Valley AI Innovators. Learn about Future Trends and Discover New Technologies.

Description: Our sessions are all about connecting the right investors to the right startups - all in an informal setting. Sign up soon, they tend to fill up. Time is money and we make the most of it. This compact session is the perfect amalgamation of networking, potential deals, and learning; all packed in one Power Hour. Any investor is welcome to register. You will get a confirmation automatically. If this is your first time attending this kind of session: you can select the 'First Time' ticket type and answer some questions about your experience. (No experience is fine!) Any startup is welcome to register, but spots are limited! The Community Builder will be in touch with you as soon as your spot is confirmed. It is useful to waitlist if spots are full since we're often able to let people in last minute. Please consider attending one of our regular Investor Readiness Sessions or the Finance Academy. Registration for those trainings is available on the Leapfunder website. Attendance at one of these sessions is often a good preparation. These VCs regularly attend our Round Table Sessions. Attend and you might get noticed by them: Pay our¬†Academy Page¬†a visit and find useful information for both investors and startups. Still have some questions? Contact luc@leapfunder.com
Title: Round Table Session - 1h Version (Online Event for Investors and Startups)
Subtitle: ‚ñ™Ô∏è FOR INVESTORS: meet new startups & spot trends in a Power Hour Round Table Session. FOR STARTUPS: test your story with real investors ‚ñ™Ô∏è

Description: Kunnen we je helpen met een gratis werkplek? Een andere omgeving, in de winter (enigszins) verwarmd en in de zomer heerlijk koel, andere mensen om je heen en koffie en thee op z'n tijd. Of je het nu uit noodzaak of uit luxe doet, of je nu werkt, studeert of een boek komt lezen: je bent van harte welkom! Wij zorgen voor koffie en thee, wifi en elektriciteit, zodat jij je kunt richten op je werk. En eens een praatje kunt maken met anderen, even pauzeert onder de middeleeuwse gewelven of je laat inspireren door de expositie voorin de kerk. Let op: Het zijn stille werkplekken, dus niet geschikt voor (online) vergaderingen. Moet je een telefoongesprek voeren, dan kun je uiteraard altijd even de zaal uit. Op woensdag en vrijdag wordt bovendien het orgel bespeeld. Gratis achtergrondmuziek, maar dus niet helemaal stil. De aangeboden momenten zijn afhankelijk van andere activiteiten in de kerk, we voegen hier regelmatig nieuwe data toe. Is er zowel 's ochtends als 's middags ViaWerkplek, reserveer dan gerust beide dagdelen! Werken √©n bidden? Van harte welkom om (aansluitend, voorafgaand of tussendoor) mee te doen met het middaggebed om kwart voor √©√©n, rechts voorin de kerk. Reserveer nu jouw werkplek! Voor vragen kun je ons bereiken op openjacobi@jacobikerk.nl. Meer informatie over ViaJacobi vind je op viajacobi.nl.
Title: ViaWerkplek
Subtitle: Reserveer een gratis werkplek in de Jacobikerk voor √©√©n of meerdere ochtenden of middagen.

Description: De  lezing wordt gegeven door Paul Spapens. Deze Brabantse journalist en schrijver is gespecialiseerd in Brabants volksgeloof. Bijgeloof is daar een tot de verbeelding sprekend en voor iedereen herkenbaar onderdeel van.   Paul Spapens staat garant voor een plezierige lezing, met veel interessante foto‚Äôs. Hij is voormalig dagbladjournalist en hij publiceerde tientallen boeken over Brabantse onderwerpen, in het bijzonder over immaterieel erfgoed, waaronder de St. Job-viering in Enschot. Paul Spapens is onderscheiden met de Zilveren Anjer, de hoogste cultuuronderscheiding van Nederland.	 Paul Spapens baseert zijn lezing deels op zijn boek ‚ÄòBijgeloof van alledag‚Äô. In dit succesvolle boek geeft hij voor elke dag van het jaar een voorbeeld van een bijgelovige praktijk. Zijn journalistieke achtergrond blijkt uit de keuze van de voorbeelden. Deze staan zeer dicht bij de belevingswereld van vandaag. Tijdens zijn lezing laat Paul Spapens zien dat bijgeloof nadrukkelijk een onderdeel is van het leven van de Brabander van nu. Talrijke bekende uitingen passeren de revue, zoals het afkloppen op (ongelakt) hout, niet onder een ladder doorlopen, ‚Äògezondheid wensen‚Äô als iemand niest en het fenomeen van het gelukbrengend hoefijzer. Tijdens de lezing worden op een deskundige manier achtergronden, herkomst en dergelijke beschreven. √ân getoond, want het interessante verhaal wordt ondersteund door talrijke mooie foto‚Äôs. Bijzonder aan deze lezing is dat hij ‚Äòinteractief‚Äô is. Voortdurend nodigt Paul Spapens de bezoekers uit om zelf met voorbeelden te komen van bijgelovige praktijken. Door de brede culturele aanpak van het onderwerp roept het verhaal
Title: 4x10=30: Paul Spapens - Bijgeloof in Brabant
Subtitle: Bijgeloof is een zeer herkenbaar onderwerp. Maar waar komen bepaalde bijgelovigheden vandaan?

Description: This exciting quest is set in medieval Breda and will guide you to both the well-known and hidden gems of the city.Discover the Spanjaardsgat watergate and the beguinage with its secluded garden. HOW IT WORKS‚ùì With challenging puzzles, immersive gameplay, and a pulse-pounding storyline, this is an experience you won't want to miss. So grab your team and get ready to take on the city in this thrilling art heist adventure! The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and memorable stories of past and present. Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? Thousands of business leaders, from hundreds of organizations and associations, in dozens of industries, have attended his Leadership Seminars, Workshops, Keynote Sessions & 1-on-1 Coaching sessions. His leadership seminar students love his unique teaching content, as well as his unique teaching method. He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? How can we constantly expand our comfort zone, by doing things we know we should do, but don't do - due to fear? +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is an Interview/Article by Coach Michael Lin on "Moving From Command & Control to Coaching & Collaboration: How Leaders and Managers Can Become Better Coaches - the Why, the What, and the How": https://medium.com/authority-magazine/moving-from-command-control-to-coaching-collaboration-michael-lin-on-how-leaders-and-managers-64fdf22eaa71 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a list of two dozen people telling us what they thought of the teaching, after they've attended the seminar or workshop by Coach Michael Lin: (These people range from brand new managers to highly experienced leaders, from various private sectors to the government...) https://youtu.be/_jPxflr1LV8 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a short sample of Coach Michael Lin in action, helping managers to get over their fears and grow into Real Leaders, so they can do what they are afraid of doing but need to be doing: https://youtu.be/Wc4GylRBQ6U +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here are over a dozen media interviews, in which Coach Michael Lin answers tough questions from journalists on leadership: https://www.linkedin.com/in/coachmichaellin/recent-activity/videos/ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ We have all attended those waste of time seminars that are: Why bring another one of those waste of time seminars to your company? And force employees to endure the ordeal? Be a real hero, bring a seminar that your employees will: And when leaders improve? everyone in the company gets to enjoy the benefit: from team members to shareholders! And all of them will be thanking you for organizing training that's useful!

Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. Description: You are the Leader. You are the boss. You are an employer. You are busy. You are always busy. You have more responsibilities than others, but you don't get more than 24 hours. How do you get more bang for your buck, out of the same 24 hours? That's why you need to Master the skill of Delegation! The above are all excellent ways to think - before you had employees. If you are an expert, and you wish to remain an expert, doing the hands on work, then the above way is the way you should be thinking. But you are no longer just a hands on expert anymore, you have employees now, you are now an employer. You need to acquire a whole new set of thinking! You will learn a whole new set of thinking, that is outside of your current "zone of thinking", you will hear things you've never heard of before, you will perform a "software upgrade" in your thinking. Description: Zin in een uitdaging, een dag vol creativiteit en reflectie? Team Staat van de Uitvoering daagt publieke dienstverleners, ambtenaren, wetenschappers, studenten, politici en alle andere visionaire denkers, creatieve geesten en tech-specialisten uit om samen mee te denken en bruikbare suggesties te doen voor een betere digitale overheid. üöÄ‚ú® Doe mee met de Staatsprint op woensdag 13 maart 2024 in Perscentrum NieuwsPoort in Den Haag! üåê üîß Moderniseren van de gemeentelijke IT Hoe kunnen we voorkomen dat elke gemeente steeds opnieuw hetzelfde wiel uitvindt? En tegelijk is het niet wenselijk dat de overheid afhankelijk is van de markt. Hoe kunnen ze elkaar beter vinden? üåêüíª üí° Tekort aan IT-personeel Er is flinke krapte aan IT-specialisten bij de overheid. En door de digitalisering neemt de behoefte alleen maar toe. Description: BOUWSTOF is d√© talkshow in Tilburg waar iedereen met een interesse voor architectuur, ruimtelijk ontwerp en design bij wil zijn. Een dynamisch programma met ruimte voor actualiteiten, interviews, verdiepende gesprekken en cross-overs . Een ontspannen avond met inhoud en diepgang! We spreken op 13 maart met: Ad de Bont - partner en stedenbouwkundige bij Urhahn en medeoprichter van Platform Gezond Ontwerp. Hij is daarnaast auteur van het boek Buitenkansen voor een uitnodigende buitenruimte. Hij geeft zijn visie op hoe je vorm kunt geven aan een beweegvriendelijke omgeving. Een klimaatbestendige buitenruimte die verleidt tot gezond gedrag: bewegen, spelen en sporten. Rob van Rijswijk en Jeroen Strijbos - Tilburgse componisten en geluidskunstenaars. Zij werken al 25 jaar samen aan de ontwikkeling van hun transformerende grootschalige werken voor het landschap, zoals Walk With Me en Signal. In hun werk maken ze gebruik van op maat gemaakte technologie, originele compositie en live performance. Hierbij hebben ze een grote interesse in hoe zij met geluid van invloed kunnen zijn op de beleving van de ruimte door het publiek. Zij delen hun ervaringen en inzicht hoe geluid beter en meer toegepast zou kunnen worden in de openbare ruimte. Marco Visser en Peter van Schie ‚Äì stedenbouwkundigen bij gemeente Tilburg en Breda. Zij nemen ons mee in de ontwerpresultaten die EUROPAN 17 opleverde voor de Stedelijke Regio Breda Tilburg (SRBT). Eind vorig jaar werden de winnaars van de Europese ontwerpwedstrijd bekend gemaakt. In Tilburg werden voorstellen gemaakt voor het Kenniskwartier en Groenewoud. De ruimtelijke opgaven van de locaties ‚Äôt Zoet en Schorsmolen (Breda) en de locaties in Waalwijk en Etten-Leur zijn ook exemplarisch voor andere dorpen en steden. Wat gaat de SRBT doen met de resultaten van EUROPAN en wat levert het voor de jonge ontwerpers op? Marjet Rutten ‚Äì inspirator bouwsector rond innovatie en duurzaamheid. Marjet is al decennia werkzaam in de bouwsector en maakt zich o.a. hard voor een duurzame bouwsector. Dit doet ze door te adviseren, onderzoek te doen en artikelen te schrijven. Ze is daarnaast werkzaam bij Building Balance en zet zich in als Gideon. Voor CAST schreef ze het artikel Pro-actief handelen is noodzakelijk! Voor de vernieuwde Verdieping -die vanavond voor de tweede keer verschijnt- verdiepte ze zich in de vraag hoe we de transitie naar een duurzame bouwsector kunnen versnellen. Bezoekers van BOUWSTOF ontvangen na afloop een uitgave van de Verdieping Duurzaam Bouwen, wat houdt ons tegen? Met bijdragen van betekeniseconoom Kees Klomp, Marjet Rutten en journalist Rens van de Plas, een interview met stakeholders, lessen uit de praktijk en illustraties door Djenn√© Fila. In straatpraat wordt poolshoogte genomen wat Tilburgers van de nieuwe architectuur van de afgelopen jaren vinden, nu er in juni een Tilburgse Architectuurprijs wordt uitgereikt. Tourtje Tilburg met Tim spreekt met Emile Kint van Tiwos bij het net opgeleverde project van de flexwoningen ‚Äôt Kompas op Zuid. Martijn Neggers sluit de avond weer kritisch af.
Organizer: CAST | Centrum voor Architectuur en Stedebouw Tilburg e.o.
Title: BOUWSTOF | 13 maart 2024
Subtitle: BOUWSTOF is d√© live talkshow over architectuur en ruimtelijk ontwerp.

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension

Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? Description: Before you had employees, all you had to do was to make sure you are a high performer yourself. You know why you wanted to get up early in the morning, fight traffic, and get to work. You now have employees, Millennial Employees! How do you get other people to want to produce high performance? How do get others to be as eager as you are? Everyone is "uniquely different", with their own set of reasons, their own set of whys: 200 people on the same airplane flying from Los Angeles to New York, they are going from Los Angeles to New York for 200 different reasons! You are going to New York for your own reasons. The other 199 passengers are also going to New York, but they are going for their own reasons. Same trip, same destination, different reasons. In just 1 hour, you will learn the skill to get your employees to Want to do what you Need them to do. This class is "On-Demand". As soon as you register, you will be able to attend the class. Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. You are busy, that's why this class is "On-demand"! As soon as you register, you'll be able to take the class! He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? How can we constantly expand our comfort zone, by doing things we know we should do, but don't do - due to fear? +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is an Interview/Article by Coach Michael Lin on "Moving From Command & Control to Coaching & Collaboration: How Leaders and Managers Can Become Better Coaches - the Why, the What, and the How": https://medium.com/authority-magazine/moving-from-command-control-to-coaching-collaboration-michael-lin-on-how-leaders-and-managers-64fdf22eaa71 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a list of two dozen people telling us what they thought of the teaching, after they've attended the seminar or workshop by Coach Michael Lin: (These people range from brand new managers to highly experienced leaders, from various private sectors to the government...) https://youtu.be/_jPxflr1LV8 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a short sample of Coach Michael Lin in action, helping managers to get over their fears and grow into Real Leaders, so they can do what they are afraid of doing but need to be doing: https://youtu.be/Wc4GylRBQ6U +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here are over a dozen media interviews, in which Coach Michael Lin answers tough questions from journalists on leadership: https://www.linkedin.com/in/coachmichaellin/recent-activity/videos/ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ We have all attended those waste of time seminars that are: Why bring another one of those waste of time seminars to your company? Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. Description: Op woensdag 13 maart organiseren AIR, KCR en gemeente Rotterdam een landelijke bijeenkomst architectuureducatie. Veel disciplines binnen cultuureducatie krijgen steeds meer aandacht in zowel het onderwijs als beleidsmatig, op landelijk en stedelijk niveau. Er is echter voor architectuureducatie nog nauwelijks een beleidsmatige context. Tijdens deze bijeenkomst willen we samen met beleidsmakers, het onderwijs en vertegenwoordigers van architectuureducatie verkennen wat architectuureducatie inhoudt √©n wat het nog meer kan zijn. Wat is er nodig om jongeren via architectuureducatie een stem te geven in de ruimtelijke opgaven? In Rotterdam alleen al zijn er een aantal toonaangevende initiatieven op het gebied van architectuureducatie. Kenniscentrum Cultuuronderwijs Rotterdam (KCR), gemeente Rotterdam, AIR, Metro010, Archiklas en IKBENWIJ hebben de handen in een geslagen om als coalitie samen te werken om architectuureducatie beter aan bod te laten komen. Op 13 maart zullen de vertegenwoordigers van architectuureducatie een korte pitch geven om inzicht te geven in hun inspanningen. Vervolgens gaan ze in een panelgesprek dieper in op de waarde van architectuureducatie. Na het panelgesprek gaan we in werktafelsessies uiteen en proberen we samen antwoord te geven op de vraag: wat kan architectuureducatie nog meer zijn? Het programma ziet er als volgt uit: Programma 15.30 ‚Äì 16.00 inloop 16.00 ‚Äì 16.05 start programma en welkom door moderator en initiatiefnemers KCR, AIR en gemeente Rotterdam 16.05 ‚Äì 16.15 pitches vormen architectuureducatie door Metro010, Archiklas, IKBENWIJ en AIR 16.15 ‚Äì 16.40 panelgesprek met Ellen Schindler (Metro010), Ma√´l Vanhelsuw√© (Archiklas), IKBENWIJ (Lorenzo Elstak) en Eva van Breugel (AIR) 16.45 ‚Äì 17.45 werktafelsessies 17.45 ‚Äì 18.00 terugkoppeling werktafelsessies en afsluiting door moderator en initiatiefnemers Locatie Independent School for the City Delftsestraat 33 3013 AE Rotterdam
Title: Landelijke bijeenkomst architectuureducatie
Subtitle: Tijdens deze bijeenkomst verkennen we wat architectuureducatie is √©n wat het nog meer kan zijn.

Description: Are you tired of the perpetual stress, urgency, and dissatisfaction lingering in your life, despite your efforts in various aspects such as your job, self-love, and personal development? Ever dreamed of breaking free from the corporate grind to pursue something that truly brings you joy and satisfaction? We understand the struggles faced by ambitious women in the male-dominated corporate world and invite you to step into your radiant self without the constant need for validation or the pressure to conform. In this workshop, we'll address the underlying issue ‚Äì not your job, but the lack of your beautiful self in your work and daily life so join this free workshop if you feel this way. Even though, it's free - when I set out to create this workshop for you, I made a promise to myself that when you attend this workshop, lightbulbs would constantly be going off in your head... So instead of saying, ‚ÄúDuh! I already knew that.‚Äù You‚Äôll say:‚ÄúI now finally understand what is holding me back and why change can seem so scary to me‚Äù You‚Äôll find out the four strategies that you have inherited and unconsciously used for years that are helping you minimise yourself and prioritise others. Time to break that cycle! So yeah, full transparency - I WILL tell you about my paid program at the very end of class, but... My promise to you is that, whether you join the paid program or not, you‚Äôll have identified your personal inherited strategies that you have used for years to obscure your radiance and core. You‚Äôll walk away from this workshop having clear, actionable steps that‚Äôll take you from "just ok" to "hell yeah, I got this". If you're ready for a change and eager to reconnect with your spark, join this workshop to break free from inherited patterns and rediscover your spark. Say goodbye to the cycle that's been holding you back. With love, Rachael
Title: Breaking the Cycle
Subtitle: You‚Äôll identify your personal inherited strategies that you have used for years to obscure your radiance and core.

Description: Do you ever create imaginary worlds? Traveling through your imagination is fun, but how do you take others with you on that journey? We all have ideas, but sharing them isn‚Äôt always easy. Part of the beauty of writing is the freedom to create new worlds. But you want to make sure your readers are along for the ride. In this fun, interactive workshop, we will practice our worldbuilding skills. Together, we will look at worldbuilding in classic literature and analyse the techniques of famous novelists and game designers. Our focus is on the future. Through short exercises, you will develop a future world. What that looks like is up to your imagination: we could be living in an Earthly paradise, we could be space explorers, we could be partially extinct. Once you have a clear picture, you will write short pieces of fiction that describe your world in sharp, dramatic language. As a final challenge, we will write a letter from the future. And if you‚Äôre happy to share yours, it will become part of an installation at our upcoming For Love of the World Festival. Spaces are limited, so sign up for the workshop today!
Title: Letters from the Future: A Creative Writing Workshop in Worldbuilding
Subtitle: Do you ever create imaginary worlds? In this fun, interactive workshop, we will practice our worldbuilding skills.

Description: De fungi zetten de poorten van de geest open en laten je in contact komen met het universele goddelijke. Op deze plek heerst de wijsheid. Tijdens deze transformerende reis maken we gebruik van plantmedicijnen. De oneindige intelligentie, kracht en multidimensionale werkelijkheid van de natuur wordt doorgegeven via de plantmedicijnen. Dit stelt ons in staat om in verbinding te komen met onze ware natuur, onze essentie. De plantmedicijnen worden genomen binnen een sacred space tijdens de ceremonie waardoor ze je mee op reis nemen en ondersteunend werken in je groeiproces en inzicht biedt op diepere lagen in ons systeem. De overgave is hier een belangrijk onderdeel van.Het zorgt voor ruimte om dat wat getoond moet worden zichtbaar kan worden. Wanneer je voelt dat het jouw tijd is om deze reis te maken begeleid ik je graag om deze unieke ervaring te beleven. Heb je vragen neem dan gerust contact met ons  op. Contra indicaties: Een truffel ceremonie gaat niet samen met gebruik van alcohol en/of drugs. Deze ceremonie is niet geschikt wanneer je medicatie gebruikt op basis van MAO-remmers of medicatie die het zenuwstelsel beinvloedt (Benzodiazepinen). Tevens is deze ceremonie niet de juiste tijd wanneer je zwanger bent. Na een hersenbloeding, een glaucoom of los netvlies kun je tevens geen truffelceremonie bijwonen. Fysieke klachten zoals hartklachten en een (erg) hoge bloeddruk kunnen verergeren door het gebruik van truffels en behoren daarom tot de contra-indicaties. ‚ÄãFysieke verschijnselen zoals duizeligheid of kortademigheid kunnen tijdelijk versterkt worden tijdens het gebruik van truffels. Deze individuele ceremonie wordt begeleid door Ted. Prijs is inclusief plantmedicijnen (truffel √©n ceremoni√´le cacao), thee, gevitaliseerd water, diner, fruit en chocolade. Alles biologisch en met liefde en aandacht bereid. Wanneer je samen met iemand een priv√© ceremonie boekt zijn de kosten 275 euro per persoon of 225 euro per persoon wanneer je met drie personen boekt. Een priv√© ceremonie met meerdere personen (max.3) of een groepsceremonie is alleen te boeken via de website: Individuele Truffel Ceremonie | gestroomlijnd
Title: E√©ndaagse truffel retraite 1-3 personen
Subtitle: De fungi zetten de poorten van de geest open en laten je in contact komen met het universele goddelijke. Op deze plek heerst de wijsheid.

Description: You are invited to a quest around Zierikzee, by following clues and solving challenges so that the city's features will likely resonate deep within your being. On this tour you will encounter some wonderful momuments, such as all three remaining city gates, the former jailhouse annex execution site and of course the old harbour. You are guided by the presence of the great historic figure of Crist√≥bal de Mondrag√≥n who will defenitely help you open your eyes to the treasury Zierikzee really is! HOW IT WORKS‚ùì With challenging puzzles, immersive gameplay, and a pulse-pounding storyline, this is an experience you won't want to miss. So grab your team and get ready to take on the city in this thrilling art heist adventure! The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and memorable stories of past and present. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. Let's play a real-world adventure! HOW CAN YOU PLAY‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Description:
Het AutismeBelevingsCircuit laat je door ‚Äúautistische ervaringen‚Äù meemaken hoe het is om met autisme te leven. Probeer je eens een voorstelling te maken van wat het betekent om een autismespectrumstoornis te hebben. Je kunt erover lezen en leren, gesprekken voeren, maar ervaren is een andere manier.
 
 Deze workshop is een actief en zeer toegankelijk dagdeel vol ervaringen. Het AutismeBelevingsCircuit bestaat uit een aantal opdrachten en werkvormen die je gaat uitvoeren. Er zijn doe-opdrachten en zintuigelijke ervaringen. E√©n van onze medewerkers leidt je door het circuit heen en er is ruimte voor het delen van ervaringen. Ook worden diverse tips gegeven over autismevriendelijkheid.
 
 Laat je misleiden door je zintuigen, ontdek wat kan en niet kan, voel nu zelf wat je misschien al ooit gelezen hebt. Via negen opdrachten brengt dit AutismeBelevingsCircuit je in de gevoelswereld van autisme.
Title: Workshop Autisme Belevings Circuit (ABC)
Subtitle: Het AutismeBelevingsCircuit is er voor iedereen die autisme wil ervaren en leren kennen.

Refund_Policy: Neem contact op met de organisator om een restitutie aan te vragen.
Description: Teun Peters maakt deel uit van Team Dylan Haegens. Samen zijn zij al jaren succesvol op YouTube. In 2018 waren zij behalve op YouTube ook in de bioscoop te zien! Do's en don'ts Wil jij gaan vloggen, maar weet je niet zo goed hoe je dat aanpakt? Of wil jij gewoon graag weten hoe bekende YouTubers werken? In de workshop vertelt Teun onder andere over de verschillende soorten vlogs, geeft hij je heel veel tips, maar leert hij je ook wat je beter niet kunt doen.Neem je eigen telefoon of tablet mee (of iets anders waar je mee kunt filmen), doe mee en krijg het vloggen onder de duim! Praktische informatie
Title: Vlogworkshop Teun Peters
Subtitle: Wil jij gaan vloggen, maar weet je niet zo goed hoe je dat aanpakt? Doe mee en leer vloggen van een bekende YouTuber, Teun Peters!

Description: Elke woensdag ochtend  kun je van 09.30 - 12.00 uur bij MOES creatief aan de slag. Je kunt  schilderen, breien, haken, naaien, tekenen of andere technieken ontdekken. MOES zorgt voor het matriaal, een naaimachine is aanwezig. Je kunt ook je eigen project meenemen en gezellig aanschuiven. Description: Informatie ‚Äì Schoolhandbaltoernooi (Voorst Actief) Team Voorst Actief organiseert in samenwerking met handbalverenigingen SC Klarenbeek en SV Voorwaarts Twello een schoolhandbaltoernooi voor leerlingen uit groep 5 t/m 8 van de basisscholen uit de gemeente Voorst. Het toernooi vindt plaats op: Het toernooi vindt op beide dagen plaats van 13:00 uur tot 17:00 uur in sporthal Jachtlust in Twello. TeambegeleiderTijdens het toernooi dienen alle teams over een teambegeleider te beschikken. Meedoen?Wil je graag meedoen met het schoolhandbaltoernooi? Dan is het de hoogste tijd om een team te formeren. Voor de groepen 5 en 6 bestaat een team uit minimaal 6 spelers en voor de groepen 7 en 8 bestaat een team uit minimaal 7 spelers. Vanwege het verschil in fysieke kracht tussen jongens en meiden, is het aan te raden om een team samen te stellen die bestaat uit alleen jongens of meiden. Indien dit niet mogelijk is, dan kan je ook een gemengd team opgeven. Een gemengd team wordt automatisch ingedeeld in een jongenspoule. Meer informatieVoor meer informatie of vragen kan er contact opgenomen worden met buurtsportcoach Rinse Procee via 06-23596080 of rinse@voorstactief.nl ======================================================================= Reglement schoolhandbal
Title: Schoolhandbaltoernooi
Subtitle: Schoolhandbaltoernooi voor kinderen uit groep 5 tot en met 8.

Description: Before you had employees, all you had to do was to make sure you are a high performer yourself. You know why you wanted to get up early in the morning, fight traffic, and get to work. You now have employees, Millennial Employees! How do you get other people to want to produce high performance? How do get others to be as eager as you are? Everyone is "uniquely different", with their own set of reasons, their own set of whys: 200 people on the same airplane flying from Los Angeles to New York, they are going from Los Angeles to New York for 200 different reasons! You are going to New York for your own reasons. The other 199 passengers are also going to New York, but they are going for their own reasons. Same trip, same destination, different reasons. In just 1 hour, you will learn the skill to get your employees to Want to do what you Need them to do. This class is "On-Demand". As soon as you register, you will be able to attend the class. There is no need to wait. "I was frustrated when I couldn't get my employees to be as eager as me. After taking this class, I realized: I was trying to project my reasons and my whys onto my employees LOL other people are not me and they have their own reasons and their whys!" "I could not get my employees to tell me what they wanted until I took this class. In this great class, I learned how to set it up so people will always want to volunteer to tell me what I needed to know - I had no idea how easy it can be if you know the right method and my old method was hard work and counterproductive!" "Should've taken this class with Coach Michael Lin 5 years ago when I first had employees. I wish I learned all these secret insights 5 years ago! Don't make my mistake - you need to take this class ASAP!" 1: Delegation Skills for Busy Leaders - Why & How 2: How To Motivate & Inspire Your Employees? Young Employees? 3: How to Overcome Employee's Resistance To Change? 4: How to Create Genuine and Sincere Employee Loyalty? 5: How to Manage the 4 Different Types of Younger Employees? 6: How to Successfully Coach Your Employees? 7: Is being friends with your employees a good idea? or a bad idea? 8: How To Get Your Best Employees To Stay For As Long As Possible? 9: How To Avoid Costly Hiring Mistakes? 10: How to Overcome Your Anxiety with Discipline and Termination? 11: Seven Secrets for Your Leadership Success that They Won't Teach You! Thousands of business leaders, from hundreds of organizations and associations, in dozens of industries, have attended his Leadership Seminars, Workshops, Keynote Sessions & 1-on-1 Coaching sessions. His leadership seminar students love his unique teaching content, as well as his unique teaching method. He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? How can we constantly expand our comfort zone, by doing things we know we should do, but don't do - due to fear? +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is an Interview/Article by Coach Michael Lin on "Moving From Command & Control to Coaching & Collaboration: How Leaders and Managers Can Become Better Coaches - the Why, the What, and the How": https://medium.com/authority-magazine/moving-from-command-control-to-coaching-collaboration-michael-lin-on-how-leaders-and-managers-64fdf22eaa71 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a list of two dozen people telling us what they thought of the teaching, after they've attended the seminar or workshop by Coach Michael Lin: (These people range from brand new managers to highly experienced leaders, from various private sectors to the government...) https://youtu.be/_jPxflr1LV8 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a short sample of Coach Michael Lin in action, helping managers to get over their fears and grow into Real Leaders, so they can do what they are afraid of doing but need to be doing: https://youtu.be/Wc4GylRBQ6U +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here are over a dozen media interviews, in which Coach Michael Lin answers tough questions from journalists on leadership: https://www.linkedin.com/in/coachmichaellin/recent-activity/videos/ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ We have all attended those waste of time seminars that are: Why bring another one of those waste of time seminars to your company? And force employees to endure the ordeal? Be a real hero, bring a seminar that your employees will: And when leaders improve? everyone in the company gets to enjoy the benefit: from team members to shareholders! And all of them will be thanking you for organizing training that's useful!

Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. You are busy, that's why this class is "On-demand"! As soon as you register, you'll be able to take the class! Or come back to the class if you get interrupted! 1: Delegation Skills for Busy Leaders - Why & How 2: How To Motivate & Inspire Your Employees? You will learn a whole new set of thinking, that is outside of your current "zone of thinking", you will hear things you've never heard of before, you will perform a "software upgrade" in your thinking. You will be equipped with skills that are new to you, so you can venture outside of your current comfort zone, and do things you've never done before, and get rewarded handsomely as a result of your new understanding, new thinking, new feeling, new actions. You will lose: Unhelpful thinking that have been holding you down :-( You will gain: New thinking that will catapult you to the next level! 1: Delegation Skills for Busy Leaders - Why & How 2: How To Motivate & Inspire Your Employees? Young Employees? 3: How to Overcome Employee's Resistance To Change? 4: How to Create Genuine and Sincere Employee Loyalty? 5: How to Manage the 4 Different Types of Younger Employees? 6: How to Successfully Coach Your Employees? 7: Is being friends with your employees a good idea? or a bad idea? 8: How To Get Your Best Employees To Stay For As Long As Possible? 9: How To Avoid Costly Hiring Mistakes? 10: How to Overcome Your Anxiety with Discipline and Termination? 11: Seven Secrets for Your Leadership Success that They Won't Teach You! Thousands of business leaders, from hundreds of organizations and associations, in dozens of industries, have attended his Leadership Seminars, Workshops, Keynote Sessions & 1-on-1 Coaching sessions. His leadership seminar students love his unique teaching content, as well as his unique teaching method. He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why should we not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why do we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? How can we constantly expand our comfort zone, by doing things we know we should do, but don't do - due to fear? +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is an Interview/Article by Coach Michael Lin on "Moving From Command & Control to Coaching & Collaboration: How Leaders and Managers Can Become Better Coaches - the Why, the What, and the How": https://medium.com/authority-magazine/moving-from-command-control-to-coaching-collaboration-michael-lin-on-how-leaders-and-managers-64fdf22eaa71 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a list of two dozen people telling us what they thought of the teaching, after they've attended the seminar or workshop by Coach Michael Lin: (These people range from brand new managers to highly experienced leaders, from various private sectors to the government...) https://youtu.be/_jPxflr1LV8 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a short sample of Coach Michael Lin in action, helping managers to get over their fears and grow into Real Leaders, so they can do what they are afraid of doing but need to be doing: https://youtu.be/Wc4GylRBQ6U +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here are over a dozen media interviews, in which Coach Michael Lin answers tough questions from journalists on leadership: https://www.linkedin.com/in/coachmichaellin/recent-activity/videos/ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ We have all attended those waste of time seminars that are: Why bring another one of those waste of time seminars to your company? And force employees to endure the ordeal? Be a real hero, bring a seminar that your employees will: And when leaders improve? everyone in the company gets to enjoy the benefit: from team members to shareholders! And all of them will be thanking you for organizing training that's useful!

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension
Title: Awakening Yoga ‚Ä¢ Weekly Class ‚Ä¢ Eindhoven
Subtitle: Weekly online class with a spiritual focus to awaken one‚Äôs consciousness and highest potential.

Description: Intro to Riso Join us for an in-person event where you can dive into the wonderful world of risograph printing. Whether you're a seasoned artist or just curious about this unique printing technique, you are more than welcome to join. We'll be gathering at Onomatopee on Lucas Gasselstraat 2A in Eindhoven to explore the magic of riso. This 4-hour workshop (10.00 - 14.00) is taught in English. We'll start with coffee and tea, an introduction to the history of the risograph, followed by a demo of the A3 risoprinter. There will be a lunch break after which everyone gets to print their designs. The workshop fee includes 15 prints in two colors of your own design in A3 (on our favorite off-white EOS paper at 90g thickness) and a list of resource links sent after the workshop. IMPORTANT NOTE! This course covers riso operational techniques, but not file preparation. Come to class with your file already prepared (you can read through the "PREPARING YOUR FILES FOR RISO" section on this website for more details: damnfineprint.com/pages/risograph-guidelines). When students use in-class time to finish their files, they typically do not have the time to get properly trained on our equipment. So make sure to bring two PDFs on USB :) Files should be A3-sized pdfs with a margin of 5 mm, set to grayscale, with a resolution of 300 DPI. Cost: total workshop fee is ‚Ç¨ 40,00. If you cancel more than 12 hours before the workshop begins, your payment can be transferred to another Intro to Riso Course in the future.
Title: Intro to Riso
Subtitle: Learn the basics of risograph, a beloved Japanese printing method that blends the digital with the analog.

Description: Algemene informatie:Heb jij interesse in dans of heb je het altijd al een keer willen proberen? Dan is dit je kans! Een dansdocent van Elzer Educatie leert je een toffe dans op muziek. Dit wordt gedaan met dansmoves uit de streetdance en de hiphop. Beginners en gevorderden, iedereen is welkom!Ben je na deze workshop enthousiast? Elzer Educatie biedt wekelijkse danslessen aan binnen verschillende dansstijlen! Datum: Woensdag 13 maart 2024Tijd/Doelgroep:Groep 3/4/5: 14.30 uur - 15.15 uurGroep 6/7/8: 15.15 uur - 16.00 uurDoor: Elzer EducatieLocatie: Sporthal De Waring, De Excelsior 133, 9207DD, DrachtenAanmelden t/m: Vrijdag 16 februari 2024Aanmelden: Via school of individueelKosten: School opgave: ‚Ç¨1,50 per deelnemer (bij de tickets staat aangegeven dat de kosten ‚Ç¨0,- zijn, omdat de school achteraf een factuur ontvangt. Individuele opgave: ‚Ç¨2,50. Dit kan via iDeal worden betaald op deze website. Dresscode: Trek je sportkleding aan en vergeet niet je zaalschoenen mee te nemen! Meest gestelde vragen:Kan ik daar parkeren?Er is een parkeerplaats naast de locatie van Elzer Educatie. Wel is er beperkt ruimte en wordt er geadviseerd om zo veel mogelijk met de fiets/lopend te komen.Welke dansstijlen kan ik verwachten?Er wordt een mix van streetdance en hiphop aangeboden.Moet je al kunnen dansen om mee te doen?Je hoeft zeker nog geen ervaring te hebben met dansen. Iedereen die interesse heeft in dans of wil kijken hoe het is, is van harte welkom om mee te doen! Van beginners tot gevorderden!Wordt er gezorgd voor begeleiding of toezicht tijdens het evenement?De lessen worden gegeven door een dansdocent van Elzer Educatie. Daarnaast is er altijd een sportcoach van Sportbedrijf Drachten aanwezig.Zijn er faciliteiten voor toeschouwers?Er is een kantine aafwezig waar ouders kunnenw achten. Afhankelijk van het aantal deelnemers kan er eventueel ook worden gegeken in het danslokaal.Worden er ook foto's of video's gemaakt tijdens het evenement?Er worden foto's en video's gemaakt door Sportbedrijf Drachten. Indien u erop tegen bent dat uw kind op deze foto's of video's komt, geef dit dan vooraf aan de dansles aan bij de medewerker van Sportbedrijf Drachten.
Title: Dansen - Schoolsportagenda 2023/2024
Subtitle: Heb je je dansschoenen al klaarstaan? Want op Woensdag 13 maart 2024 wordt het tijd om je moves te laten zien tijdens SSA Dansen!

Description: Opgelet: al onze werfbezoeken zijn helaas volzet! Tip: schrijf je zeker in op de nieuwsbrief van de Oosterweelverbinding via deze link. Via die tweewekelijkse nieuwsbrief kondigen we namelijk telkens aan wanneer er op dit platform nieuwe data vrijkomen om aan te sluiten bij een werfbezoek. Op de linkeroever van de Schelde in Antwerpen bouwen we aan de tunneltoerit en de tunnelmond van de nieuwe Scheldetunnel in Antwerpen.Tijdens het werfbezoek kom je te weten waarom en hoe de tunnel gebouwd wordt. Programma werfbezoek Scheldetunnel Linkeroever Duur bezoek: circa 2 uur Wat: Toegankelijkheid: het traject is niet geschikt voor rolstoelgebruikers of wie slecht te been is. Veiligheid op de werf Omwille van de grootte en de complexiteit van de werf, is het niet mogelijk bezoeken te organiseren in de bouwkuip.Om de omvang en de indrukwekkende werken toch te kunnen tonen aan het brede publiek werd een uitkijktoren van ongeveer 2 verdiepingen hoog gebouwd.Vanop deze toren heb je een heel mooi globaal overzicht over de tunneltoerit en de tunnelmond en hoe deze opgebouwd worden. Het dragen van een lange broek is verplicht voor iedereen!Aangezien je een actieve werf bezoekt, draag je best aangepast stevig schoeisel dat vuil mag worden. Door een bezoek te reserveren ga je akkoord met de algemene voorwaarden en het bezoekersreglement dat geldt voor de werf Scheldetunnel Linkeroever.
Title: Werfbezoek Scheldetunnel Linkeroever Reeks 2
Subtitle: Bezoek de werf Scheldetunnel op Linkeroever
